title: Inskin 3D Tempered Glass Screen Protector with Shock-Proof TPU Edge, fits Apple Watch 38mm [Series 3, 2, 1]. Black. 1-Pack.
features: ***Note: Designed and precision cut for Apple Watch 38mm Series 1, 2 and 3. Please, keep in mind that product is NOT designed to be submerged in water.

Premium ultra-slim tempered glass for the clearest and most reliable screen protection available. Unlike competitors products with weak edges only adhesive and annoying “dot matrix” grid, our screen protector has full glue on the entire surface of the glass for excellent touch sensitivity and reliable device adhesion.
Surface hardness of 9H provides the best available protection from impacts, scratches and scuffs. Not even a sharp knife can damage the tempered glass.
Flexible TPU fiber frame provides a very comfortable surface to grip, absorbs side impacts and prevents chipping. It perfectly matches the bezel of your watch for a slick and seamless look.
The Inskin Tempered Glass has a hydrophobic and oleophobic nano coatings that significantly reduce appearance of fingerprints and smudges.
description: Full glue curved glass, the holy grail of the screen protection, has been finally solved. Inskin 3D glass screen guard curves with the edges of your watch to provide unmatched level of protection without affecting touch screen responsiveness.

Choose Inskin tempered glass for maximum light filtration, brilliant color accuracy and superior protection from impacts, drops, scratches and daily wear. Inskin screen protector adds minimal thickness to your device and with surface hardness of 9H it will easily survive an attack from scissors or a box cutter. The optical grade tempered glass is incredibly strong, scratch resistant and treated to repel annoying smudges. Install in just 3 simple steps and enjoy your mint-condition watch for years to come. Try it and you'll never use plastic screen protector again!

We back our products with a lifetime warranty, and will offer you no-hassle replacement if:  you followed installation instructions and encountered problems such as unremovable bubbles or fitment issues. your screen protector sustains wear and tear or scratches during normal use (not including damage caused by drops or other impacts).
Authentic product is manufactured and sold by Inskin only!
